participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and restless, Liam dreams of a life beyond the confines of his small town. He is passionate about pursuing a law degree and enjoys the thrill of horseback riding.
participant_1.background: i have three arabian horses. i help tend the fields. my father is a farmer. i like to ride horses. i like to listen to rock music while working.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Determined and insightful, Sofia is focused on her goals and has a strong desire to succeed in law. She is rooted in her horse-farming background but yearns for the excitement of city life.
participant_2.background: my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i was raised on a horse farm. i'm from a small town. i dream of moving to the city.

content.text: i live in a small town, thats not so good
i like nature and our horses
but life is boring here, iwanna be a lawyer and wann go to a big city
i raising horses with my family but not forever
to moving to a big city is my greatest dream
